instance_template: cpu("BoltX"). cpu("HydraPro"). cpu("LiteCore"). gpu("StormZ"). gpu("Nebula9"). gpu("VegaLite"). psu("PowerMax750"). psu("Eco600"). psu("Titan900"). watt("BoltX", 85). watt("HydraPro", 125). watt("LiteCore", 60). watt("StormZ", 180). watt("Nebula9", 150). watt("VegaLite", 95). cost("BoltX", 400). cost("HydraPro", 550). cost("LiteCore", 350). cost("StormZ", 800). cost("Nebula9", 650). cost("VegaLite", 500). cost("PowerMax750", 200). cost("Eco600", 150). cost("Titan900", 250). capacity("PowerMax750", 750). capacity("Eco600", 600). capacity("Titan900", 900).
generator: 1 { selected_cpu(C) : cpu(C) } 1. 1 { selected_gpu(G) : gpu(G) } 1. 1 { selected_psu(P) : psu(P) } 1. selected(X) :- selected_cpu(X). selected(X) :- selected_gpu(X). selected(X) :- selected_psu(X).

hard_constraints.description: To prevent system failure under peak load, the combined wattage of the selected CPU and GPU must remain at least 100W below the power supply's maximum capacity.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- selected_cpu(C), selected_gpu(G), selected_psu(P), watt(C, WC), watt(G, WG), capacity(P, CP), WC + WG > CP - 100.

hard_constraints.description: To ensure cost-performance justification, the component with the highest power draw must also be the most expensive component in the configuration.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- selected(X), watt(X, W), W = #max { W1, I : selected(I), watt(I, W1) }, cost(X, CX), MC = #max { C1, Z : selected(Z), cost(Z, C1) }, CX < MC.

hard_constraints.description: HydraPro processors and VegaLite graphics cards are prohibited from being paired together due to thermal incompatibility.
The Eco600 power supply unit is incompatible with StormZ GPUs due to insufficient voltage regulation for high-draw components.
Company policy forbids a configuration where all three selected components are the lowest-priced options in their respective categories.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- selected_cpu(C), cost(C, VC), VC = #min { V1, C1 : cpu(C1), cost(C1, V1) }, selected_gpu(G), cost(G, VG), VG = #min { V2, G1 : gpu(G1), cost(G1, V2) }, selected_psu(P), cost(P, VP), VP = #min { V3, P1 : psu(P1), cost(P1, V3) }.

hard_constraints.description: To maintain pricing balance across system components, no two selected parts may have a cost difference exceeding $400.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- selected(X), selected(Y), cost(X, CX), cost(Y, CY), CX - CY > 400.

soft_constraints.description: The budget committee requires minimizing the total system cost to prevent excess hardware spending.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("excess_spending", Item, Cost) :- selected(Item), cost(Item, Cost).
